title: Forgiving Me (You Keep)*
lyrics:
[Chorus]
You keep
You keep on forgiving me, yeah
You keep on forgiving me, yeah
And when I feel like you're all out of reasons to keep
Hey-hey
You keep on forgiving me, yeah
You keep on forgiving me, yeah, yeah, yeah, you do
[Verse 1]
Ever since I can remember
Remember never feeling good enough
All I ever did was let you down
Never understood why you stayed around
How many pieces that I've break your heart in
Just so I can put it back together
With everything, you've given me your pardon
No, I don't derserve you no, no, no
Don't deserve a love so precious
Can't nobody love like you
Every time I shut the door
You always let me right back through
Tired of myself makin' the same mistakes
Made me re-evaluate the way I live
When I'm sure you've had all you can take

[Chorus]
You keep
You keep on forgiving me, yeah
You keep on forgiving me, yeah
And when I feel like you're all out of reasons to keep
Hey-hey
You keep on forgiving me, yeah
You keep on forgiving me, yeah, yeah, yeah, you do
[Post-Chorus]
Sometimes it feels good to cry-y-y-y
Cry-y-y-y
La-la-la, la-la
Like I'm cleansing my soul, ooh-ooh
Cry-y-y-y, cry-y-y-y
La-la-la, la-la
Oh-oh, yeah
[Verse 2]
After washin' my hands, I get 'em dirty again
You always turn the water back on
You never turn your back on me, no
All I wanna do is be like you
Learn to forgive everybody like you
Never met another so patient, no replacement
For somebody like you, woah, ooh-woah

[Chorus]
You keep
You keep on forgiving me, yeah
You keep on forgiving me, yeah
And when I feel like you're all out of reasons to keep
Hey-hey
You keep on forgiving me, yeah
You keep on forgiving me, yeah, you do
Woo-ooh, ooh-ooh
[Post-Chorus]
Sometimes it feels good to cry-y-y-y
Cry-y-y-y
La-la-la, la-la
Like I'm cleansing my soul, ooh-ooh
Cry-y-y-y, cry-y-y-y
La-la-la, la-la
